reviewText: They don't make movies like this anymore. Such a rich story that makes you grateful for the life you have. And that makes you realize the harrowing injustices of the criminal justice system. The characters are well developed, the pacing is good, and even though the acting kind of wooden and the characters stereotypical, this a great movie to see.

.Such a beautiful movie. It is just hurtful to see how people can hurt each other mercilessly. Human being the worst vicious animal if not raised . Wolf gives birth to wolf, lamb give birth to lamb it is only human being who gives birth to both lamb or wolf.

Great dvd to watch with a gorgeous lady as the lead.

Annie (Cheryl Ladd) is a struggling single mom whose boyfriend doesn't exactly live life on the straight and narrow. When one of his drug deals goes badly wrong he sets up Annie to take the fall. Taking the rap for a crime she didn't commit Annie struggles to deal with life behind bars but finds common ground in other inmates who have children on the 'outside'.

A very very great movie. I cried like a baby. A mother had fight very, very hard to get
her kids back
